column2: "Mo nkwa afon me kra; Mebɛma m’apensi kwan; Mebɛkasa wɔ me kra n’awerɛhow mu."
"Mebɛse Nyankopɔn dɛ
column3: Mma mmbu me fɔ; Kyerɛ me adze kor a osian ntsi ma enye me ridzi esi yi."

column2: "Ana oye ma wo dɛ ɔwo etseetsee obi
column3: Dɛ ɔwo ibu wo nsaano edwuma enyimtsia
column4: Na ehyerɛn nyimpa bɔn n’apam do?"

column2: "Ana ɔwo ewɔ honam enyiwa
column3: Anaa ɔwo ehwɛ adze dɛ mbrɛ nyimpa hwɛ?"

column2: "Ana wo nda tse dɛ dasanyi nda? Anaa wo mfe tse dɛ dasanyi dze
column5: Na idzi mo bɔn ekyir atwee yi?"

column2: "Naaso ɔwoara inyim dɛ mennyɛ nyimpa bɔn; Na obi nnyi hɔ a obotum agye efi wo nsamu?"
"Wo nsa na ɔyɛɛ me na ɔween me nyimpa mu nyina hyiae; Nna ɔwoara resɛɛ me yi."
"Meserɛ wo
column3: kaa dɛ ɔwo na eween me dɛ awendɛtse: Na aso edze me bɛba huntuma mu bio?"

column2: "Ana ɔwoara innhuee me nnguu dɛ numfonsu
"Ɔwo na edze wer na honam edura mo ho
column3: Na edze mbiew na ntsin ewurawura mo mu."

column2: "Ɔwo na adom me nkwa na enyimpa
column3: Na wo nhwɛdo pa no so akora mo sunsum do."

column2: "Naaso iyinom na edze siee w’akoma mu; Mehu dɛ iyi na edze etsia me:"
"Sɛ meyɛ bɔn a
column3: ɔno ɔwoara na ebɔ me nyikam
column4: Na ɔwo rummbu me bem wɔ m’emumuyɛ ho."

column2: "Sɛ meyɛ nyimpa bɔn a
column3: mundue; Na sɛ meyɛ tseneneenyi mpo a
column4: meremma me tsir do; Enyimguase ahyɛ me ma Na ɔwoara hwɛ m’amandzehu."

column2: "Na sɛ me tsir ma noho do a
column3: ɔwo ibetsiw me dɛ gyata: Na ɔwo asan nye me ebedzi anwanwasɛm."

column2: "Ɔwo edze w’adasefo afofor ba mo do
column3: Na ema w’ebufuhyew dɔɔ so wɔ mo do; Nsakyer na akodzi esi m’enyim."

column2: "Ebɛnadze ntsi na iyii me fii awotoa mu bae? Ao
column3: sɛ migyaa mo sunsum mu na enyiwa bi ennhu me ɛ."

column2: "Kɛtseankyɛ meyɛɛ dɛ mammbabra koraa; Nkyɛ wɔdze me fii yafun mu kɔr adakamona mu."
"Ana me nda nnyɛ kakrabaabi bi? Dɛm a sianka
column7: Mekyerɛ sum na wu no nwinwin asaase no do:"

column2: "Sum kebii asaase a
column3: ɔtse dɛ sum noara; Owu no nwinwin asaase a nhyehyɛɛ biara nnyi hɔ
column4: Na beebi mbrɛ kan no tse dɛ sum kebii no a."
